    AverageCalculator

    public static class AverageCalculator.GC
extends AverageCalculator
    Sets up AverageCalculator to perform GC content calculations.

    aaron

      • AverageCalculator.GC

        public AverageCalculator.GC(GenomeData genomeData,
                    boolean circular,
                    int stepSize,
                    int windowSize)
        Creates a new GC calculator around the passed genomic data, with the passed properties.
        Parameters:
        genomeData - The data to calculate averages for.
        circular - Whether or not the genomeData represents a circular genome.
        stepSize - The step size for the average calculations.
        windowSize - The window size for the average calculations.
